title: Modern Agriculture Technology: How Billions of Peaches Are Harvested and Processed by US Farmers

tasks.task: Embarking on a journey through the peach farming industry.
subtasks: Explaining peaches' importance in American agriculture.
Describing peach tree planting and care.
Detailing pruning techniques for peach trees.
Highlighting bee pollination's role in peach production.
Presenting sorting and weighing procedures at packing facilities.
Highlighting the role of migrant workers in harvesting.

tasks.task: Covering peach processing at large-scale facilities.
subtasks: Discussing peaches' inspection and washing steps.
Demonstrating blanching, peeling, slicing, and pitting processes.
